quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of butter has about 102 calories, mostly from fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp butter?
Is butter high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 7.3 g saturated fat per tbsp, which is a significant portion of daily limits.

faqs.q: What's the difference between salted and unsalted butter calories?
faqs.a: Negligible calorie difference; unsalted has less sodium (about 2 mg vs. 91 mg).
No carbs, fiber, or sugars—it's almost pure fat.

faqs.q: How much cholesterol in 1 tbsp butter?
faqs.a: Around 31 mg, mostly from the dairy fat content.
